snippet.title: Temporal Shore - Art Update Trailer
snippet.description:
A unique blend of roguelike deckbuilding and survival strategy, where you control your characters only with your cards. You not only play your actions, but also decide who to perform them. Can you break the time loop and lead your team to safety, or will you die trying?

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2335800/Temporal_Shore

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/ntG95jFV79

Follow Overhead Games on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/OverheadGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OverheadGames
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/OverheadGames
Web: https://overheadgames.com

#survival #strategy #games #gameplay #deckbuilding #steam #timeloop
